definitions.definition: wild animals or birds that destroy plants or food, or attack farm animals and birds

examples.text: On farms the fox is considered vermin and treated as such.

definitions.definition: insects that live on the bodies of animals and sometimes humans

examples.text: The room was crawling with vermin.

definitions.definition: people who are very unpleasant or dangerous to society

wordOrigin: Middle English (originally denoting animals such as reptiles and snakes): from Old French, based on Latin vermis ‘worm’.
